altTitles.th: ติด ตาม ตาย Real Account

description.en:
In a world driven by fictionalized friendship, courtesy of the program named "Real Account", the table suddenly turns, and the cybernetic world turns real! How will they survive?  
  
**Note:** So… This manga is *technically* a two part… the first 10 chapters are part 1 and the 11 onward is part 2. In the past it's been split up into two series(Real Account & Real Account II).

title.en: Chiyu Mahou no Machigatta Tsukaikata: Senjou wo Kakeru Kaifuku Youin

altTitles.ja-ro: Chiyu Mahou no Machigatta Tsukaikata: Senjou wo Kakeru Kaifuku Youin

altTitles.fr: La mauvaise façon d'utiliser la magie de soin

altTitles.zh: 治愈魔法的错误使用方法

altTitles.ja: 治癒魔法の間違った使い方 ～戦場を駆ける回復要員～

altTitles.zh-hk: 治癒魔法的錯誤使用法～奔赴戰場的治療人員～

altTitles.en: The Wrong Way to Use Healing Magic

altTitles.pt-br: O jeito errado de usar magia de cura

description.en:
Usato, an ordinary high schooler, happens to run into two fellow students after school one rainy day. Suddenly, all three of them are engulfed in a magic circle and transported to a fantasy world. There’s just one tiny problem — Usato is simply dragged along by accident!  On top of that, Usato learns that he is capable of using healing magic — an incredibly rare affinity in this new world.

Now Usato must spend his days with the rescue team thugs, struggling through their hellish training regimen — learning the wrong way to use healing magic.

Get ready for an eccentric otherworld fantasy filled with comedy and combat!
description.ja:
**最前線を駆けるのは、常識破りの回復要員！？**

平凡な高校生のウサトは、同じ学校のスズネ、カズキと共に異世界へと転移してしまう。 三人は魔王軍から王国を救うための『勇者』として喚び出された――が、 勇者としての適性を持つのはスズネとカズキだけ。ウサトはただ巻き込まれただけだった！ しかし、ウサトにレア属性の『治癒魔法使い』の素養が見つかったことで事態は一変し…！？ 「小説家になろう」発！　ギャグありバトルありのドタバタ異世界ファンタジー！
description.pt: Usato Ken é um estudante normal do segundo ano do ensino médio. Em um certo dia chuvoso, as duas pessoas mais admiradas do conselho estudantil, Inukami Suzune e Ryuusen Kazuki, percebem que ele não tem um guarda-chuva, então Kazuki empresta o seu para ele. Depois eles acabam conversando enquanto vão embora juntos, mas de repente são convocados para outro mundo como heróis. Parece que Ken foi arrastado pela invocação por acaso, mas ele não pode voltar para a Terra. O que ele fará? Será que vai chorar pelo cantos ou vai agir?
description.ru: Одним дождливым осенним днём жизнь абсолютно заурядного ученика старшей школы Усато Кена перевернулась с ног на голову: вместе с двумя членами школьного совета – президентом Инуками Судзунэ и вице-президентом Рюунзэном Кадзуки Усато-куна призвали в другой мир! После проверки магических способностей наш герой оказывается целителем и попадает в отряд спасателей, командир которого отличается крайне нестандартными методами подготовки…
description.pt-br: Usato Ken é um estudante normal do segundo ano do ensino médio. Em um certo dia chuvoso, as duas pessoas mais admiradas do conselho estudantil, Inukami Suzune e Ryuusen Kazuki, percebem que ele não tem um guarda-chuva, então Kazuki empresta o seu para ele. Depois eles acabam conversando enquanto vão embora juntos, mas de repente são convocados para outro mundo como heróis. Parece que Ken foi arrastado pela invocação por acaso, mas ele não pode voltar para a Terra. O que ele fará? Será que vai chorar pelo cantos ou vai agir?

title.en: Isekai ni Kita Boku wa Kiyoubinbode Subayasa Tayorina Tabi wo Suru

altTitles.ja: 異世界に来た僕は器用貧乏で素早さ頼りな旅をする

altTitles.en: I Came to Another World as a Jack of All Trades and a Master of None to Journey While Relying on Quickness

altTitles.pt-br: Eu Vim Para Outro Mundo Como Um Pau Para Toda Obra E Um Mestre De Ninguém Para Viajar Enquanto Confiava Na Rapidez

altTitles.zh: 来到异世界的我靠着神速和万能技能进行着旅行

altTitles.ko: 이세계에 온 나는 다재무능으로 민첩함에 의지한 여행을 한다

altTitles.zh-hk: 來到異世界的我靠著神速和萬能技能進行著旅行

description.en:
My name is Asagi Kamiyashiro. My last memories of my old life were a night like every other at my part-time job up until an unnamed assailant mercilessly stabbed me. As I was fading into an empty void losing my consciousness, I had an explosive realization of how much I regretted in this life. I never honestly used my degree, I never had a girlfriend, and I lived a pretty quiet life. Day in and day out I worked like I was on clockwork. As the thought of regrets filled my mind, I told myself, if I was reincarnated I would make use of that life to its fullest. That's when a disembodied voice spoke.  
 
_"The desire to be reincarnated confirmed. Granting Unique Skillset: Jack Of all Trades, Master of None"_ 
 
At first, I considered those words to be insulting… But now… Not so much… My story begins in the middle of a foggy grass hill.

---
**Note:** The chapter *numbering* in the Volumes are one ahead of the Magazine/Digital due to treating the split 2.1 & 2.2 as separate chapters (2 & 3)
description.id: Aku, Asagi Kamiyashiro, diserang oleh perampok saat bekerja paruh waktu. Ketika aku bangun, saya dipindahkan ke dunia lain yang dihuni oleh monster. Aku tidak pernah berpikir saya akan diserang oleh goblin dalam hidupku! Aku berhasil mencapai kota dan memeriksa statusku di Guild Petualang, hanya untuk menemukan bahwa kecepatanku tinggi. Selanjutnya, nama dari skill yang kumiliki adalah "Jack of all trades, master of none"...?
description.ja:
**小説家になろう発!!　異世界最速!? 神速と万能スキルを持つ異世界転移者のファンタジー、開幕!!**

**「異世界に来た僕は器用貧乏で素早さ頼りな旅をする｣
異世界転移した転移者の素早さ極振りの楽勝ライフが漫画に！**
 
 
アルバイト中に強盗に襲われた僕、上代朝霧。次に目を覚ましたのは、異世界だった。空腹に耐えられず、ひとまず向かった森でゴブリンに遭遇。しかし、なぜだか上手く武器を使え、撃退に成功する!!

　その後も狼に追われたりしつつも、何とか町へと到着。そこでギルドに加入し、依頼をこなしていたら、素早さの数値が異常に上昇していることが発覚!!だから、僕はこの素早さと器用(貧乏)さを武器に、この世界で生きることを決めるのだが――

　異世界最速の転生者が駆け抜けるファンタジーライフ、開幕!!
description.pt-br: Tarde da noite, no meio do meu trabalho de meio período em uma loja de conveniência, tive um encontro com um ladrão e fui impiedosamente morto a facadas. Quando estava prestes a perder minha consciência, pensei o quanto eu queria fazer isso e aquilo quando ouvi uma voz... 'O desejo de ser convocado foi confirmado. Concedendo habilidade única. 'Valete para toda obra, Mestre de ninguém.'' Palavras rudes como essas foram ditas.  Jack de todos os comércios, mestre de ninguém? Não mexa comigo! Esses pensamentos e desejos foram em vão quando minha consciência se desvaneceu, quando eu acordei estava em uma colina verde e nevoenta.

altTitles.th: เบอร์เซิร์ก

description.en:
Guts, known as the Black Swordsman, seeks sanctuary from the demonic forces attracted to him and his woman because of a demonic mark on their necks, and also vengeance against the man who branded him as an unholy sacrifice.

Aided only by his titanic strength gained from a harsh childhood lived with mercenaries, a gigantic sword, and an iron prosthetic left hand, Guts must struggle against his bleak destiny, all the while fighting with a rage that might strip him of his humanity.  
  
***Won the 6th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize Excellence Award in 2002.***

---

Note: Following Miura Kenta's death in 2021, the series has been taken over by Kouji Mori, who supervises the series with art done by Studio Gaga.
description.es: Guts, conocido como el Espadachín Negro, busca refugio de las fuerzas demoníacas que se sienten atraídas por él y su mujer debido a una marca demoníaca en el cuello, además de vengarse del hombre que lo marcó como un sacrificio impío. Únicamente con la ayuda de su fuerza titánica, adquirida tras una dura infancia vivida con mercenarios, una espada gigantesca y una prótesis de hierro en la mano izquierda, Guts deberá luchar contra su sombrío destino, al tiempo que combate con una rabia que podría despojarle de su humanidad.
description.ru: Гатс – Черный Мечник, за которым охотятся демоны. Мечник стремится найти все убежища демонов и отомстить человеку, сделавшего их него «жертвенную овечку». Черный Мечник противостоит жестокой судьбе благодаря непоколебимой воле, невероятной силе, и, конечно же, меча. Постоянные сражения со злом приближает Гатса к параллельному миру тьмы, лишая его человечности. Берсерк – сложная, но сильная история о сражениях и злой судьбе.
description.th:
เบอร์เซิร์ก เป็นชื่อมังงะ แนวดาร์ค แฟนตาซี ของญี่ปุ่น วาดโดยเคนทาโร่ มิอุระ มีการดำเนินเรื่องเกิดขึ้นในยุคกลางของยุโรป โดยได้รับอิทธิพลมาจากโลกแห่งจินตนิมิตด้านมืด มีตัวละครเอกของเรื่องคือ กัทส์ ทหารรับจ้างผู้โดดเดี่ยวและ กริฟฟิท หัวหน้าของกลุ่มทหารรับจ้างที่รวมตัวกันภายใต้ชื่อ กองพันเหยี่ยว

----
 [Shopee (ไทย)](https://shopee.co.th/berserk%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%8B%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%81-%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B4%E0%B9%8A%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%84-%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1-1-20-%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B6%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87-i.63434898.1855330863)
description.tr:
Kara Kılıç Ustası olarak anılan Guts, vücutlarındaki şeytani damga yüzünden onlara musallat olan şeytani güçlerden, kadınını ve kendisini korumanın bir yolunu aramaktadır. Aynı zamanda onu damgalayan ve bir kurban konumuna düşüren adamdan intikam almaya çalışmaktadır. Paralı askerlerle geçirdiği zorlu çocukluk yıllarının getirdiği tecrübeler sayesinde elde ettiği büyük gücü, devasa bir kılıç ve protez bir kol ile destekleyen Guts, karamsar kaderiyle mücadele etmek zorundadır. Tüm bunları yaparken, insani benliğini kaybetmesine neden olabilecek öfkeyle başa çıkmalıdır. 

TheWildDeer'dan Dorylaion tarafından biraz yorum katılarak sitedeki ingilizce açıklamadan çevrilmiştir.
description.uk: Його ім'я Ґатс, Чорний Мечник. Він могутній воїн, про якого говорять лишень пошепки. У нього є велетенський меч , рука зі заліза й шрами від незліченних боїв і тортур. А ще його плоть позначена Тавром — нечестивим символом, який притягує сили пітьми й робить Ґатса їхньою жертвою. Але Ґатс не прийме таку долю спокійно: він порубає на фарш війська проклятих, як і будь-кого, кому стане дурості стати на його шляху! Ґатс іде в товаристві ельфа Пака (більше докучайла, ніж товариша) темним і закривавленим шляхом, який приведе лише до загибелі... Чи помсти.
description.es-la: Guts, conocido como el Espadachín Negro, busca refugio de las fuerzas demoníacas que se sienten atraídas por él y su mujer debido a una marca demoníaca en el cuello, además de vengarse del hombre que lo marcó como un sacrificio impío. Únicamente con la ayuda de su fuerza titánica, adquirida tras una dura infancia vivida con mercenarios, una espada gigantesca y una prótesis de hierro en la mano izquierda, Guts deberá luchar contra su sombrío destino, al tiempo que combate con una rabia que podría despojarle de su humanidad.
description.pt-br: Guts, conhecido como o Espadachim Negro, busca refúgio das forças demoníacas atraídas por ele e sua mulher por causa de uma marca demoníaca em seus pescoços, e também vingança contra o homem que o marcou como um sacrifício profano.  Ajudado apenas por sua força titânica adquirida de uma infância dura vivida com mercenários, uma espada gigantesca e uma mão esquerda protética de ferro, Guts deve lutar contra seu destino sombrio, enquanto luta com uma raiva que pode despojá-lo de sua humanidade.

description.en: Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

altTitles.ja-ro: Grand Dwarf - Machi Kou Shokunin, Takumi no Waza de Isekai Musou

altTitles.ja: グランドワーフ〜町工職人、匠の技で異世界無双〜

altTitles.en: Grand Dwarf ~The Smalltown Craftsman's Skills Are Unmatched In Another World~

description.en:
For 52 years, Takumi Fujimura, a craftsman who has continued to hone his skills at a town factory, finds himself in a predicament when he has a dispute with a client and stops getting loans from banks. After many years of hard work, he finally collapses, but he awakens in a different world where he meets Frau, a girl who aspires to become a hero. 

With the benefit of modern technology and decades of crafting skill, can Takumi take this new world by storm?

altTitles.en: Once Again Into the Light, Alone

altTitles.fr: Encore une fois sous la lumière

altTitles.pt: Mais uma vez até a luz

altTitles.th: องค์หญิงผู้หวนคืนสู่แสงสว่าง

description.en:
I was falsely accused of attempting to kill my younger sister, who was worshipped as a holy maiden. There was not a single person who believed in me, nor was there a person who stood up for me. Not even my blood-related family. I was fourteen years old, and it was winter. I, who was Edenbell's Fourth Princess, was miserably beheaded in front of the masses. After the end of my death, I awoke and what came was...

"My baby, my precious younger sister."

With a delightful smile, he held my small fingers. That warm gesture, warmth, and touch. He sang me a lullaby as he held me gently and swayed.

---
When Princess Alisa is framed for a terrible crime, she is shocked to learn that her own family wants her executed. After losing her will to live, she finds herself reborn as the princess of a rival empire. And though her new family acts sweet and kind on the surface, she's not sure they can be truly trusted. Luckily, with this new life comes new power. But what exactly is this mysterious magic that awakens in her? And more importantly, can she use it to get vengeance against those who once betrayed her?

---

description.fr:
Alyssa, la quatrième princesse d’Edenbell, est accusée à tort d’avoir tenté de tuer sa petite sœur. Condamnée froidement à mort par sa famille, elle se réincarne comme princesse de l’empire rival, Elmir. Dégoutée par la trahison de ses proches, elle jure de ne plus jamais aimer qui que ce soit. Mais l’empire d’Elmir est bien différent de celui d’Edenbell… Dans ce nouvel environnement, parviendra-t-elle à retrouver foi en l'humanité et à découvrir les terribles secrets qui entourent son exécution?

---
Personne n’a cru en moi, personne n’était là pour me soutenir, même ma propre famille. A ce moment-là, j’étais Alyssa, 4e princesse d’Edenbell. J’étais dans un état épouvantable et j’avais la gorge asséchée par la soif. J’ai regardé ma sœur cadette, espérant qu’elle les empêcherait de me tuer. Mais ce que j’ai vu sur son visage, c’était une expression d’extase, elle était heureuse d’assister à ma mort. Après avoir été exécutée, j’ai ouvert de nouveau mes yeux. J’étais dans le ventre de quelqu’un et je pouvais entendre des voix. Avant de retomber dans l’inconscience, j’ai entendues les paroles d’un petit garçon:

«Bienvenue, ma précieuse petite sœur,» il a ri chaleureusement, «Le monde entier t’aime.»

Je me suis réincarnée en tant que première princesse de l’empire Elmir, le rival de l’empire Edenbell!

---

description.id:
Aku dituduh mau membunuh adikku sendiri yang mendapat julukan sebagai saintess. Tidak ada seorang pun yang percaya denganku, dan tidak ada seorang pun yang melindungiku. Bahkan keluarga kandungku sendiri tidak mau mendengarkan penjelasanku sedikit pun. Pada akhirnya, aku yang merupakan putri ke-4 kekaisaran Edenberr mengakhiri hidupku dengan cara yang sadis pada usia 14 tahun. Setelah kehidupan pertamaku berakhir, saat aku membuka mata... "Sayang, adikku yang manis." Ada yang memanggilku dengan hangat. Dia memegang tanganku yang mungil sambil tersenyum. Aku bisa merasakan kehangatan darinya. Dia menggendongku sambil menyanyikan lagu tidur untukku.

---

description.it:
Quando la principessa Alicia viene incastrata per un terribile crimine, rimane scioccata nell'apprendere che la sua stessa famiglia vuole che sia giustiziata. Dopo aver perso la voglia di vivere, si ritrova a rinascere come la principessa di un impero rivale. E sebbene la sua nuova famiglia si comporti in modo dolce e gentile in superficie, non è sicura che ci si possa veramente fidare di loro. Fortunatamente, con questa nuova vita arriva un nuovo potere. Ma cos'è esattamente questa misteriosa magia che si risveglia in lei? E, cosa più importante, può usarla per vendicarsi di coloro che una volta l'hanno tradita?

description.ja:
イデンベル帝国の皇女アリサには腹違いの妹マリアンヌがいた。 金色の瞳を持ち誰からも愛される華やかな妹に対し、アリサは使用人にも冷遇を受けていた。 アリサがマリアンヌをお茶に招待した日、突然マリアンヌが血を吐き倒れる。 家族からも嫉妬したアリサが毒を入れたと決めつけられ、アリサは死刑になる。この濡れ衣はマリアンヌの陰謀だった。 もう人間には生まれ変わりたくないと神に願ったが、アリサはライバル国・エルミール帝国の皇女アイシャとして転生してしまう。 前世と正反対の愛情深い家族。特に腹違いの兄・イシスにやすらぎを感じ次第に心を開いて行く。 精霊使いの能力を持ち、賢く優しい少女へと成長するアイシャは、前世の残酷な記憶を乗り越え再び光の中で輝けるのか!?

Селена. Хранительница Империи. Богиня луны и мести... Неужели у меня не будет шанса отыскать справедливость и отомстить? Если так, то поскорее убейте меня. И прошу... Пускай впредь я больше никогда не появлюсь на свет человеком. Чтобы больше не сталкиваться с предательством. Чтобы избежать жизни, в которой ни единая живая душа тебя не любит. description.sk:
Keď je princezná Alisa obvinená z hrozného zločinu, je šokovaná, keď sa dozvie, že jej vlastná rodina chce, aby ju popravili. Cíti sa porazená a ocitne sa znovuzrodená ako princezná znepriatelenej ríše. A hoci jej nová rodina pôsobí na povrchu milo a láskavo, nie je si istá, že sa im dá skutočne dôverovať. Našťastie s týmto novým životom prichádza nová sila. Ale čo presne je to tajomné kúzlo, ktoré sa v nej prebúdza? A čo je dôležitejšie, dokáže to využiť na pomstu tým, ktorí ju kedysi zradili?

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr:
Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

description.de:
Als die sechsjährige Inés zum ersten Mal den gut aussehenden Erben von Haus Escalante erblickt, macht sie den Jungen direkt zu ihrem Verlobten. Da alle adeligen Männer bekanntlich gleich sind, dachte sie, sie könnte auch gleich einen gut aussehenden wählen. Aber der kleine Lord Cárcel ist noch nicht bereit für diese Art von Verpflichtung und verbringt die nächsten 15 Jahre damit, die Heirat um jeden Preis zu vermeiden. Glücklicherweise ist das kein Problem für Inés, da das Scheitern ihrer Ehe genau das ist, was sie will. Tatsächlich gibt sie ihm sogar ihren Segen dafür, sich auszutoben, solange er sich nicht in ihre Angelegenheiten einmischt. Leider macht es nicht so viel Spaß, ein Playboy zu sein, wenn die Verlobte einem die Erlaubnis dazu gibt. Und bedeutet das nicht, dass sie ihn auch betrügt? Und so entschließt sich Cárcel, Inés’ Meinung über ihn zu ändern und zu beweisen, dass er der Ehemann sein kann, den sie immer wollte.

---
Note: The webtoon is released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel.

description.en:
When six-year-old Inés laid eyes on the handsome heir to House Escalante, she promptly made the boy her fiancé. Since noblemen are all the same, she figured she might as well choose a pretty one. But Lord Cárcel isn't ready for this sort of commitment just yet, and he spends the next decade and a half avoiding the marriage at all costs! Luckily, that's no trouble for Inés, as this marriage failing is exactly what she wants. In fact, he has her blessing to sow his wild oats as long as he stays out of her business. Unfortunately, being a playboy isn't as fun when your fiancée gives you permission. And doesn't this mean she's cheating on him too? Now, Cárcel is determined to change Inés' mind about him and prove he can be the husband she's always wanted.

---

description.fr:
Lorsque la jeune Inés pose ses yeux sur l'héritier de la famille Escalante du haut de ses six ans, elle n'hésite pas un instant avant de demander à ce qu'il soit son fiancé. Comme les hommes nobles sont tous les mêmes, autant en choisir un beau, pas vrai? Mais le seigneur Cárcel n'est pas du genre fidèle, et il aimerait bien esquiver ce mariage... seulement, lorsque quelques années plus tard, il apprend qu'Inés se fiche bien de son amour et de sa fidélité après leur union, et qu'elle n'est pas éprise de lui comme il le pensait, Cárcel réalise qu'il n'était pas si désintéressé qu'il ne l'aurait cru. Il décide donc de prouver à sa future femme qu'il peut être un époux digne d'elle... sans se douter une seconde de ce qui avait bien pu pousser Inés à le choisir ainsi lorsqu'ils étaient enfants...

---

description.id:
Dia bilang setelah kami menikah nanti, aku bahkan bisa lebih bebas daripada saat ini? Omong kosong macam apa itu? Dia bahkan memperbolehkanku untuk berkencan dengan wanita mana pun? Dia adalah seorang Duchess Escallante yang tidak tinggal bersama dengan Duke Escallante. Dia tidak butuh pria yang baik hati, melainkan pria yang suatu saat bisa disingkirkan dari kehidupannya secara hukum. Tapi sayang sekali, aku, Duke Escallante, tidak akan membiarkan hal itu terjadi. Aku tidak tertarik dengan kebebasan yang kau tawarkan. "Aku memang seorang bajing*n, tapi aku lebih setia daripada yang kamu bayangkan, Ines Valeztena."

Inés non aveva bisogno di un marito normale, ma di un uomo che un giorno sarebbe stato legalmente rimosso dalla sua vita . Sfortunatamente , avere un playboy come fidanzato non è per niente una cosa bella. È così che Cárcel é stato etichettato. Ma ad un certo punto decide di cambiare e dimostrare che può essere il marito perfetto!

description.uk:
Шестирічна Інес звертає увагу на красеня-спадкоємця дому Ескаланте та оголошує його своїм нареченим. Оскільки усі знатні чоловіки для неї однакові, вона подумала, що могла хоча би вибрати гарненького. Але лорд Карсель ще не готовий до такого роду зобов’язань. Він проводить наступні півтора десятиліття, уникаючи шлюбу за будь-яку ціну!
На щастя, для Інес це не проблема, оскільки фіаско цього заміжжя — це саме те, чого вона хоче. Таким чином Карсель отримує благословення на походеньки, допоки він не втручається у її бізнес.
Та, на жаль, бути плейбоєм не так весело, коли ваша наречена дає вам дозвіл. І чи не означає це, що вона теж йому зраджує? Тепер Карсель налаштований змінити думку Інес про нього і довести, що він може бути чоловіком, якого вона завжди хотіла.

description.pt-br:
“Me casei com o maior gostosão da sociedade para então me divorciar e finalmente poder ser livre.”

Quando Inês de 6 anos colocou seus olhos no lindo herdeiro da Casa Escalante, ela logo o fez seu noivo. Já que homens nobres são todos iguais, ela imaginou que poderia pelo menos escolher um bonito. Mas lorde Cassel ainda não estava pronto para esse tipo de compromisso, e passou uma década e meia evitando o casamento de todo jeito! Felizmente, isso não era problema para a Inês, porque a falha neste casamento era exatamente o que ela queria. Na verdade, ele tinha a permissão dela para fazer o que quisesse, contanto que ficasse fora dos assuntos pessoais dela. Infelizmente, ser um playboy não é divertido quando se tem a permissão da esposa. E isso não significa que ela o está traindo também? Agora, Cassel está determinado a mudar a ideia que Inês tem na cabeça sobre ele e provar que ele pode ser o marido que ela sempre quis.

description.en:
The small country Sunkwoll is in a tight spot because it's under attack of the great country Zarmine. But the general, Rain, who's reputed to be an exceptionally gifted swordsman, is against the war and won't enter the battle. But how is one supposed to wage a war like this anyway?  
  
*Note: Author passed away in Feb 2019, leaving the source material for the manga, novel incomplete.*

The Indigo League: the ultimate challenge for Pokémon trainers. Structured like a massive tournament, anyone eager to show off their Pokémon can participate, from rookies to gym leaders to even the Elite Four themselves.  
  
This is the story of Red, Blue, and Green, three friends who decide to partake in the tournament.

An action packed suspense story of a boy who obtains the absolute authority! 
The story centers around a boy named " Hwang Chomin"  who spends his high school days while enduring its unjust violent treatment. Being informed of his isolated brother's passing away, he receives his phone and confronts the truth about his brother. He learns that his brother is the leader of a notorius ring called [Emperor's Division]. Upon learning that he decides to impersonate his brother and take control of the division by passing judgment on it's scums. And so the King's Game that must be never revealed begins!

description.en:
After his sister is devoured by a dragon and losing all their supplies in a failed dungeon raid, Laios and his party are determined to save his sister before she gets digested. Completely broke and having to resort to eating monsters as food, they meet a dwarf who will introduce them to the world of Dungeon Meshi - delicious cuisine made from ingredients such as the flesh of giant bats, walking mushrooms, or even screaming mandrakes.  
  
---
- **Ranked 1st in the 2016 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! for Male Readers (Shonen/Seinen)**
description.es: Después de que su hermana fuera devorada por un dragón y habiendo perdido todas sus provisiones, Laios y su equipo están decididos a salvar a Farin antes de que sea digerida por la gran bestia. Es así como conocen a un singular enano que los introducirá al mundo gastronómico de las mazmorras: delicias elaboradas a partir de la carne de murciélagos gigantes, hongos caminantes y mandrágoras chillonas.
description.id:
Seorang penjelajah muda, Laios, bersama kawan-kawannya mendapat serangan hebat dari seekor naga jauh di lantai terdalam Dungeon. Mereka kehilangan seluruh uang dan perbekalan, bahkan seorang anggota tim! Walau ingin bergegas kembali dan menyelamatkan rekannya, mereka dihalangi satu masalah besar, “Tanpa makanan dan uang, mereka pasti akan kelaparan di tengah penjelajahan!” Namun, Laios mendapat ide cemerlang, “Kita makan monster saja!”. Slime, kalajengking, basilisk, mandrake, dan kelelawar raksasa… Tidak ada satu monster pun yang luput dari perut-perut keroncongan di Dungeon!! (Gramedia.com) 

[Terjemah Indonesia](https://www.gramedia.com/search?q=delicious%20in%20dungeon)
description.pt-br:
Depois de perder todos os seus suprimentos e provisões e também ter sua irmã devorada por um dragão durante uma expedição na masmorra, Laios e seu grupo estão determinados a salvá-la antes que ela seja completamente digerida pelo dragão.
Mas estando completamente falidos e tendo que recorrer a comer monstros como alimento, eles encontram um anão que os apresentará ao mundo de Dungeon Meshi – uma deliciosa culinária feita com ingredientes como a carne de morcegos gigantes, cogumelos andarilhos e até mesmo mandrágoras.

description.en: Building furniture and friendships have a lot in common. Intention, effort, and hard work are needed for both crafts. This is a story of girls in a DIY club building both as they carve out their futures. None of it comes easy, but that doesn’t stop any of ’em. Furniture, friendships, and the future—they’re building it all with their own hands!

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα τους διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

title.en: Koe no Chiisai Komori-san to Kusodeka Oogoe no Oobayashi-kun

altTitles.en: The Quiet Komori-san and the Loud Oobayashi-kun
KOMORI-SAN in a small voice & OBAYASHI-KUN in a loud voice

altTitles.vi: Komori-san trầm lặng và Oobayashi-kun ồn ào

altTitles.ja: 声の小さい小森さんとクソデカ大声の大林くん

altTitles.ko: 목소리가 작은 코모리 양과 목소리가 엄청 큰 오바야시 군

altTitles.zh: 轻声细语小森同学和震耳欲聋大林君

altTitles.en: Komori-san With a Small Voice and Obayashi-kun With a Loud Voice

description.en: Komori-san has a complex about her soft voice, compared to the loud and brash Ohayashi-kun. Their vocal volume may be opposites, but their feelings for each other are mutual. Will they ever be able to properly communicate?
description.es-la: Komori-san tem um complexo sobre sua voz suave, em comparação com o Oobayashi-kun alto e impetuoso. Seu volume vocal pode ser oposto, mas seus sentimentos um pelo outro são mútuos. Eles algum dia serão capazes de se comunicar adequadamente?

description.en: Atagoul Monogatari takes place in a fantasy world where humans and cats can talk to each other. The story revolves around the adventures of the protagonist, Hideyoshi, and his friends.

title.en: I Only Want to Beat You

altTitles.en: I Want to Beat You, Oh Roji
I Want to Defeat You, Oh Roji

description.en: The male lead 'Lee Gigo', who has never lost a single time in his life, and the female lead who defeated him 'Oh Roji'. Who will end up as the victor of this 'bet'?
description.uk: Головний герой Лі Ґіґо, який жодного разу в житті не програв, і головна героїня, яка перемогла його, О Роджі. Хто в підсумку стане переможцем в цьому «парі»?

description.en:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

description.en: Manga about a girl who was looking for a job and ended up in a corporation of magical girls fighting monsters.
description.ja: “魔法少女”――それは、誰もが憧れる「職業」である。　就職活動に苦戦する女子大生・桜木カナ。面接先で怪異に巻き込まれたカナは、駆けつけた魔法少女・越谷を手助けしたことをきっかけに、ベンチャー企業『株式会社マジルミエ』に魔法少女として新卒入社することになり…!?
description.ru: Манга про девочку, которая искала работу и попала в корпорацию девочек-волшебниц, борющихся с монстрами.

description.en:
In a world where opposites attract, a chance encounter sparks a connection between a serious black-haired girl and a charismatic blond delinquent, painting a cute tale of young love and friendships. As the series unfolds, their seemingly carefree lives take unexpected turns, delving into the shadows that haunt their lives. 

An artful blend of laughter and heartfelt moments, this manga tells about the complexities of youth, friendship, and your past catching up to you.

His more-than-friends, less-than-lovers cousin is so cute that he could die!!!!? 

Nozomu is a boy staying at his uncle's house over summer vacation. In the countryside, where there are no convenience stores, or any busses even, the boy has a problem. That problem is his younger cousin, Sou! He’s being led around by this tanned, energetic girl day after day and can’t show her the dignity befitting his older age! 

On top of that, whether intentional or not, he’s getting flustered by Sou’s inviting demeanor. Eventually, Nozomu couldn’t take his eyes off Sou and is falling more and more under her spell...!!? With a “cousin” like this, his reason is having a hard time hanging on! 

This is a romcom with a guy who’s going under from all his tanned cousin’s teasing!
description.ja:
友達以上恋人未満な従妹が死ぬほど可愛い!!!!?

夏休みの間、叔父の家に過ごすことになった少年・望。コンビニもない、バスも来ない、ないない尽くしの田舎で彼にはある悩みがあった。

その原因は「従妹」の爽!! 褐色元気っ娘の彼女に毎回からかわれては年上の威厳を見せられないでいた！ しかも、天然なのか意図的なのか分からない爽の誘ってくるような仕草にドキッとする始末。いつしか、望は彼女のことが目を離せず、ドンドン爽に攻略されていって……!!?

こんな「従妹」がいてくれたら理性が持たない!? からかい上手の褐色従妹ちゃんによるお兄ちゃん攻略ラブコメ!!!!!

description.en: Toono Ao failed to get into college and became a ronin, studying for next years exams instead. To better study for them, Ao moved out to live on his own into an apartment near his cram school. It's not much, but it's a place to call his own. But not long after moving in, a drunken lady finds her way into his new home! It doesn't matter how hard he tries, she just continues to make herself at home and take advantage of him. This is not okay! ...Or is it? His humble castle is no longer his own. Onee-san is invading!
description.ja:
夢にまで見た上京一人暮らし。狭いけど駅近物件。そんな僕の大事なお城は見知らぬおねーさんに侵略を許した！変わる壁紙、開発されるカラダ・・これって大歓迎案件？
 
--- 
 
Yume ni made mita jōkyō hitorigurashi. Semaikedo eki kin bukken. Son'na boku no daijina o-jō wa mishiranu o ne ̄-san ni shinryaku o yurushita! Kawaru kabegami, kaihatsu sa reru Karada kore tte dai kangei anken?
description.zh: 透野青没能考上大学，成了一名浪人，转而准备明年的考试。为了更好地复习，他搬到了补习学校附近的公寓里独自生活。虽然房子不大，但也算得上是自己的家了，可刚搬进去没多久，一个喝醉酒的女人就强行闯进了他的新家！不管他怎么努力，她就是继续把他当成自己的家，占他的便宜。这可不行！......还是不行？他简陋的城堡不再属于他了一姐姐正在入侵中！
description.es-la: Toono Ao no consiguió entrar en la universidad y se convirtió en ronin, y continúa estudiando para los exámenes del año siguiente. Para estudiar mejor, Ao se mudó a vivir por su cuenta a un apartamento cerca de su escuela de reforzamiento. No es mucho, pero es un lugar al que puede llamar suyo. Pero al poco tiempo de mudarse, una dama borracha se abre paso en su nuevo hogar. No importa lo mucho que él lo intente, ella sigue sintiéndose como en casa y aprovechándose de él. ¡Esto no está bien! ...¿O no? Su humilde castillo ya no es suyo. ¡Onee-san está invadiendo!

title.en: Rail Wars! - Nihon Kokuyuu Tetsudou Kouantai - The Revolver

altTitles.ja: RAIL WARS!　ー日本國有鉄道公安隊ー　The Revolver

altTitles.en: Rail Wars! Japanese National Railways Security Force - The Revolver

description.en: Takayama Naoto, 2nd-year student at Kiryu Tetsudou High School, has been selected to intern at the infamous "Public Rail Road Security Corps," much to Naoto's chagrin. He only wanted to be assigned to a safe, relaxed group to live quietly for the rest of his life. Now he ends up in one of the most dangerous work-places in Japan. This group is the first line of defence against the extreme far right groups fighting to privatize the railroads. Considering his lack of training or motivation, will he be able to survive the rail wars?

When Rad was a child he couldn't control his power and as a result he killed his older brother Rinpu. After that Rad decided to teach people who were the same as him how to control their own power. So he created a school for it. Now he's looking for people with the same power to recruit them to his school.
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, onde o maior temor da sociedade são os <<DAGON>>, crianças com metade do corpo transformado em demônio, Rad procura um meio para salvá-las e adaptá-las na sociedade, mas será mesmo possível?

altTitles.en: I want to cry with you on Thursday

altTitles.ru: Я хочу плакать с тобой в четверг

altTitles.ja: 木曜日は君と泣きたい。

description.en:
“–I have a dirty secret about myself.”  
  
This is the story of four individuals that attend Teito University:  
Aikawa Kaoru has a secret they can't tell anyone.  
Senmitsu Ryou, the childhood friend who's always by Kaoru's side, also has his own pile of secrets.  
Shimuzu Reika, the model who Kaoru yearns for, too has a secret that she must not let be seen.  
Saotome Chiaki, ever or so popular with the girls, has a secret they don't want others to know.  
Four people who wish for love and have become liars; let the curtain rise on their painfully earnest, sexual love story––!
description.es:
"Es muy humano tener un pequeño y sucio secreto que no puedes contar."   
Kaoru va a la misma universidad que la modelo popular que admira: Reika.   
En el campus, Reika brilla con su inteligencia, belleza y perfección. En medio de todo esto, Kaoru ve a Reika besando a otra mujer.   
Kaoru y Reika están en el centro de esta historia, mezclándose con el amor y el odio de hombres y mujeres.  


---

**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/vQZ6J3h.png) Author’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/m0721804)
description.fr:
"C'est une chose très humaine que d'avoir un sale petit secret qu'on ne peut pas dire”   
Kaoru va au même collège que la modèle populaire qu'elle admire: Reika.   
Sur le campus, Reika brille par son intelligente, sa beauté et sa perfection. Au milieu de tout ça, Kaoru voit Reika embrasser une autre femme.   
Kaoru et Reika sont au centre cette histoire, se mêlant à l'amour et à la haine des hommes et des femmes.

description.en:
She was murdered. Her remains, cut cleanly in two. Her death quickly forgotten, and the killer unidentified. After all, the only fate of the weak in this world is to be trampled underfoot by the strong.
However, twelve years later, her childhood friend, Inubo Mamoru, plots revenge...so that he can put a murderer overlooked by the world six feet under with his own two hands. Having found the only element missing in his years-long plan--a "partner"--Inubo sets down the long and rough road to revenge. A suspense story of vengeance and rebellion!

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện cổ tích về người mẹ kế
Cổ tích về một người mẹ kế

altTitles.es: El cuento de hadas de una madrastra

altTitles.zh-ro: Mou Ge Jimu De Tonghua Gushi

altTitles.th: เทพนิยายของแม่เลี้ยงชูริ

altTitles.pt-br: O Conto de Fadas de uma Madrasta

description.en:
The Iron Widow, the Spider Widow, the Male Hunter, the Witch of the Neuschwanstein Castle, the embarrassment of noble ladies… These were all the words used to describe the Marchioness Shuli von Neuschwanstein. Despite receiving such harsh criticism from everyone, she persisted in raising her 'children,' left behind from her late husband. On the day of her eldest son's wedding, signaling his possession of the family's seat as Marquess, she felt she had finally tied up all loose ends and could live the rest of her life out peacefully. However, she had been terribly mistaken as she finds herself getting caught up in an accident and dying whilst leaving the castle on his wedding day. Upon opening her eyes, she finds herself waking up to the day of her husband's funeral, seven years ago.

'I refuse to suffer any more. I won’t live as I did in the past a second time!'

---

description.es:
La viuda de hierro, la viuda araña, la cazadora de hombres, la bruja del Castillo Neuschwanstein, la vergüenza de las damas de la nobleza… Estos eran los términos usados para describir a la Marquesa Shuli von Neuschwanstein. A pesar de recibir tan duras críticas de todos, ella persistió en criar a sus 'hijos', dejados a su cargo por su difunto esposo. En el día de la boda de su hijo mayor, en la que él tomó posesión del título familiar de Marqués, ella sintió que por fin había atado todos esos cabos sueltos y que por fin podría vivir su vida pacíficamente. Sin embargo, se equivocó de sobremanera, pues se halla víctima de un accidente mortal en el momento de su partida de dicha boda. Al abrir sus ojos, se halla despertando el día mismo del funeral de su esposo, siete años atrás.

'Me rehuso a sufrir más. ¡No viviré como viví en el pasado por segunda vez!'

---

description.fr:
Belle-mère à la rescousse! Mariée à l'âge de quatorze ans à un vieux noble rapidement décédé, elle se retrouve à devoir s'occuper de ses quatre beaux-enfants à peine plus jeunes qu'elle. Des années plus tard, ces derniers la détestent à cause des choix qu'elle a dû faire pour les protéger... Soudain, une seconde chance s’offre à elle! Saura-t-elle ne pas répéter les mêmes erreurs?

Shuri baru berusia 16 tahun saat ditinggal mati Yohanes Neuwanstein, suaminya. Tidak hanya harta berlimpah, mendiang suaminya juga meninggalkan empat anak tiri, Jeremy, Elias, serta si kembar Rachel dan Leon, yang lebih cocok jadi adik Shuri!

description.ja:
『神様、こんなの…あんまりです…!』

田舎の無名家門に生まれたシュリーは、貧しい家族の企みでノイヴァンシュタイン侯爵の元へ嫁がされる。
でも、侯爵が亡くなって…いきなり4人の子どもの継母に――!?
『鉄血の未亡人』と非難されながらも必死に当主としての役目を果たしついに迎えた長男・ジェレミーの結婚式の日――。
継母としての務めを終え、新たな人生を始めようと馬車に乗ったはずなのに…7年前の侯爵の葬儀の日に逆戻り!!
周囲に敵ばかりだったシュリーの2度目の継母ライフはいかに……?

description.ko:
철혈의 미망인, 거미 과부, 남자 사냥꾼,
노이반슈타인 성의 마녀, 귀부인들의 수치…….

모두 슈리 폰 노이반슈타인 후작 부인을 가리키는 말이다.
세상에 욕 먹어 가며 동생뻘인 피 한 방울 섞이지 않은 자식들을 키워냈다.

그리고 마침내 첫째 제레미의 결혼식 날,
모든 고생과 노력이 결실을 맺는 날이라 생각했다.
그러나 그것은 그녀의 엄청난 착각이었다.

결혼식에 오지 말라는 통보를 듣고
성을 떠나던 중, 사고에 휘말려 목숨을 잃게 된 것이다.

그런데 눈을 떠보니, 칠 년 전 죽은 남편의 장례식 날로 돌아왔다.

더 이상 개고생은 사양이다.
두 번 다시 예전처럼 살지 않으리라!

---

description.zh:
铁血遗孀,蜘蛛寡妇,诺斯坦城的魔女,贵妇们的耻辱。这些都是暗指施里诺斯坦侯爵夫人。 她一边挨骂,一边培养着没有一滴血缘关系的弟弟辈子女。在长子的婚礼那天，她卷入事故而失去了生命。 再睁开眼,时间又回到七年丈夫的葬礼那天，这次，她不会再像从前那样生活了！

description.en: The protagonist is a girl with the ability to visit a surreal alternate dimension full of monsters in her dreams. One day, she encounters another human girl there and receives a plea for help.

altTitles.ja: おとめてぃっくシンドローム

description.en: Tachibana Otome, a 16-year-old otaku girl whose dream guy has "Blonde Hair and Blue Eyes," suddenly meets just that type of person in real life when Towada Oji transfers into her class… How will it go for her?

Romelia, a lonely girl, and Kutli, a young high-ranking soldier, are solemnly married in the presence of God. What they share, however, is not "conjugal love," but the "unbearable fate" they have mutually borne.

altTitles.en: The Law Of Being Friends With A Male

altTitles.ja: 男友達って彼氏になれる?

description.en: Jay is a guy that wanted to talk with his friend about their secret crushes, When Jay was about to confess who he has a crush on, his friend Jiwoon, who’s crush is actually towards Jay, was hopefull that Jay was going to confess his feelings towards her. But she felt shocked when she learned that actually Jay’s crush was someone else, after that, Jay asked her about her crush, Jiwoon tried to avoid the question and gave him a vague description which caused a misunderstanding that his crush was actually towards Jay’s friend Seohyun. She and Jay are just good friends without anything romantic going on between them, The way Jay interacts with her is just in a friendly manner and tries to help her to get her “crush”….Let the romantic drama begin at school!
description.fr: La première romance de Jiun s'est terminée lorsque son béguin, Jae-i, lui avoue qu'il aime quelqu'un d'autre. Pour aggraver les choses, Jae-i croit à tort que le béguin de Jiun est son effrayant meilleur ami, Seohyeon, et il tente de l'aider à gagner le cœur de celui-ci. Maintenant, Jiun doit faire face à un plus gros problème qu'un amour à sens unique, le petit-copain qu'elle n'a jamais imaginé se rapprocher.
description.ko:
남몰래 '재이'를 짝사랑해온 '지운'.  재이가 자신에게 고백할 줄 알았던 지운은, 재이의 짝사랑 상대가 다른 사람이라는 사실을 알고는 정신이 아득해진다. 
짝사랑이 허무하게 끝났다고 생각함과 동시에, 재이가 자신의 짝사랑 상대를 '서현'이라고 착각하고 있다는 걸 알게 된다. 
그저 재이의 키 크고 덩치 큰 친구 중 하나일 뿐인, 말 그대로 남자인 사람 친구일 뿐인 서현과 자신을 이어주려는 재이의 행동에 해탈하고 마는데...

description.en:
Junpei Ichinose, a student at a magic school in Tokyo, is a dropout who has never discovered his magic aptitude. Suddenly, the beautiful witch Meryl appears before him and tells him, "I need your power, the reincarnation of the Demon King". Junpei finds out that he has the power of the Demon King. He learns that he has the power of the Demon King, and his secret is revealed to Sonia, a beautiful girl who is a descendant of a brave warrior. Junpei, who has no intention of becoming a Demon King, persuades Sonia to teach him how to use his power properly. However, the Demon King's power is the strongest and worst "erotic magic"!

The harem school battle to master H-magic with beautiful girls is about to begin!
description.id: Junpei Ichinose, seorang siswa sekolah sihir di Tokyo, dia adalah seorang penyihir gagal. Tapi tiba-tiba, penyihir cantik Meryl muncul di hadapannya dan mengatakan kepadanya, "Aku membutuhkan kekuatanmu, reinkarnasi Raja Iblis". Junpei mengetahui bahwa dia memiliki kekuatan Raja Iblis. dan rahasianya terungkap kepada Sonia, seorang gadis cantik yang merupakan keturunan pahlawan. Junpei, yang tidak berniat menjadi Raja Iblis, membujuk Sonia untuk mengajarinya cara menggunakan kekuatannya dengan benar. Namun, kekuatan Raja Iblisnya adalah kekuatan "sihir erotis".
description.ja: 魔法学校の落ちこぼれが目覚めた力はエロ限定!?美少女たちとHな魔法を極めるハーレム学園バトル開幕!!

The hero, Chloe, is a strange hero who demands a bounty when saving people.  And what makes it different is the prize... He only likes married women, so he demands the prettiest Milf in town.

**"If you want me to save the city, give me the most beautiful milf"**

 A unique erotic Fantasy story created by a hero!
description.id:
Pahlawan ini keji...!!  Pahlawan, Chloe, adalah pahlawan aneh yang menuntut hadiah saat menyelamatkan orang. Dan yang membuatnya berbeda adalah hadiahnya...Dia hanya senang dengan wanita yang sudah menikah, jadi dia menuntut Milf yang paling cantik di kota. 

"Jika kau ingin aku menyelamatkan kota, berikan aku milf yang paling cantik" 

Sebuah cerita unik fantasi erotis yang dibuat oleh pahlawan!
description.ja: この勇者、下劣ッ…！！勇者・クロエは人々を救う際に報酬を要求する、異質な勇者だった。そして彼が異質なのはその報酬であった…彼は人妻にしか興奮しない為、その町で一番美しい人妻を要求するのであった。「町を救ってほしければ、一番美しい人妻を寄越せ」異色の勇者がおりなすエロファンタジー！

description.en: Afflicted by a "mysterious illness," high school first year Kuroe has spent her entire life avoiding socializing with others. However, after coming into contact with Minami Arata, the most popular boy in school, something changes— and Kuroe's true powers are unleashed…

10 years since he reincarnated in hell…Takamichi is troubled. With the “Incubus” power unlocking further to become stronger by having sex with women but his growth peaked. “I’ll move to a new area, wait for me beautiful women of the new world!” Sexy & violent pretty girl battle fantasy!
description.pt-br: 10 anos desde que ele reencarnou no inferno ... O herói “Takamichi” está com problemas. Com o poder do “Incubus” de ficar mais forte fazendo sexo com mulheres, ele já não tinha mais inimigos e seu crescimento atingiu o pico. “Vou me mudar para uma nova área, esperem por mim, lindas mulheres do novo mundo!” Fantasia de batalha de menina bonita sexy e violenta!

description.en:
Namidare Rekka has a very unusual birthright. After his 16th birthday, he will be drawn into many different stories. Each story has a heroine, and each story depends on him to be the hero. On his first day of high school, a strange uniformed girl that only he can see shows up. She claims to be from the future, and claims that his rescuing of many heroines is going to cause serious trouble for the future.  
  
It's not long after this encounter that his troubles begin. His childhood friend Satsuki invites him somewhere, possibly to confess her feelings for him. However, before she can, she's kidnapped! Rekka wants desperately to help her, but he finds himself being tossed into various sci-fi and fantasy worlds, each with their own heroines in trouble. Will he be able to get back to Satsuki? Will he be able to save all the others? How can he really tell the consequences of his well-meaning actions?
description.fr: Namidare Rekka a un droit de naissance assez inhabituel. Après son 16e anniversaire, il sera envoyé dans différentes histoires. Chacune de ces histoires possède une héroïne, et chacune a besoin de l’aide d’un héros. Le jour de ses 16 ans, une jeune fille en uniforme apparaît de nulle part, et lui annonce venir du futur ! En effet, Rekka risque d’être à l’origine de gros problèmes en sauvant plusieurs héroïnes ! Et les ennuis commencèrent pour notre héros… Peut-on connaître à l’avance les conséquences de ses actes ?
description.ru: Намидар Рёкка имеет необычную родословную, по этой причине уже в свои 16 лет он попадает в круговорот событий, которым предшествовало появление странной девушки. Девушка же невидима для окружающих, кроме нашего героя. Она заявляет, что в будущем его действия вызовут ужасные последствия для всего мира, ведь он будет спасать множество героев… И, разумеется, все они девушки…

title.en: Sherbet Above the Sea of Fog

description.en:
Sherbet, a girl from a noble family, is forced to marry a man she has never met. She decides to escape this fate and joins a cruise that sails through the sea of mist, a place full of legends and secrets.

There, she meets several interesting characters, such as a pirate captain, a runaway princess, a curious mermaid and a cruel empress. She also discovers that the cruise is actually a ghost ship that takes the souls of the dead to the next world.

She will have to face various dangers and challenges to escape the ship and find her true love.

Mai Yashiro (22) was an average office worker until the day a video game console arrived in her mailbox. The game she is forced to play, "Nightmare," is a dangerous game in which one risks both the lives of the ones they love and their own body!! If you refuse to play, those dear to you die. If you lose battles in the game, parts of your body (your arms or legs, your voice, etc.) cease functioning. The horror of this game spreads throughout society in a flash, and, to fight it, Mai's company creates a "Nightmare" Strategy Team. After being assigned to this team, Mai and her dependable comrades boldly rise up against this hellish game. Adapted from the super-popular novel which has received over 40,000,000 hits online!!

altTitles.ja: 抱けど暮らせど「好き」が言えない

description.en:
Tomoe Mochisaka, who has been living at the bottom of the pile, meets a man named Hajime Shiroyama at a company party at a large white company where she has changed jobs.
He is so handsome that, without knowing his name, she has the first one-night stand with him in her life...but this man is not only good-looking, he is also good-looking! He is a winner with a good face, a good body, and a good position! He is a winner. He is a winner with not only a good face, but also a good body and a good position!

On the contrary to Tomoe, who was happy to have finally met a very handsome man as a friend, Shiroyama was thinking about the fact...!
You can't get through to him no matter how much you hold him! An exhilarating romantic comedy with a difference!

description.pt-br: Após anos de desencontros, nosso protagonista reencontra a caloura com quem se dava bem no ensino médio. Porém, aparentemente, ela se tornou uma famosa influenciadora.

description.en: Suzuki Souta, a high school boy on the school volleyball team, is interested in his classmate Shinonome Asahi, a member of the girls' volleyball team. She thought of him as a good volleyball player, so she has been seeking him out every day. Souta was a keen volleyball player until junior high. However, because of his height, he could never become the spiker he longed to be. As a result, he got into the habit of giving up on things. Souta's high school life: Will he meekly accept what he cannot have? Or will he try to become a man who can stand with Asahi? Youth is a series of choices. Please, Souta, hang in there and do your best!

[Official English](https://drawnandquarterly.com/books/red-flowers/)

The story revolves around Tomoya Mizuhara, a 13-year-old boy who suddenly gains a big sister when his father remarries. 17-year-old Ichika is a little strange, and her affection for Tomoya is rather overwhelming, if not scary. On top of things, Ichika's friend Ruri is the ultimate sadist. Then there is Ichika's big-breasted quarter-Russian friend Marina.

Kanata and his friend Tokiji are ordinary teenagers in modern Japan. Mysterious deaths have begun to occur in their city, where the victim's head will transform into an animal face and explode. There are rumors about these strange incidents, but one day it happens at Kanata's school.  
  
Kanata is caught up in the incident and gains the special ability to "remove his limiter". This allows him to greatly enhance a single ability of his, but after he uses it, another ability will go out of control. He encounters a mysterious, beautiful woman in a black skin-tight combat suit named Shiki. She forces Kanata and Tokiji to become deeply involved in these incidents.  
  
Just what is going on? What mysterious organization is behind this!? A world-spanning conspiracy begins to unfold.
description.pt-br: Kanata e seu amigo Tokiji são adolescentes comuns do Japão. Mortes misteriosas começaram a ocorrer em sua cidade, onde a cabeça da vítima se transforma em um animal. Há rumores sobre estes incidentes estranhos, mas um dia isso acontece na escola de Kanata. Kanata é pego no incidente e ganha a habilidade especial para "tirar o limitador". Isto lhe permite aumentar consideravelmente a única habilidade dele, mas depois que ele usa, outra habilidade vai sair do controle. Ele encontra uma mulher misteriosa, bela em um combatente de terno colante  preto chamado Shiki. Ela obriga Kanata e Tokiji para investigarem esses incidentes. O que está acontecendo? Mas quem está por trás dessa misteriosa organização!?  Uma conspiração de amplitude mundial começa a se desenrolar.

description.en:
The story of two foreign men living in Japan.

(from ebookjapan):

Nick, with his stylish hair, and Lever, with his dazzling eyes behind his sunglasses, are a HOT & CRAZY foreign duo who will face any obstacles that come their way! 

The genius Kyogoro Miyata, who wastes no time in drawing, unleashes a shocking high-speed manga. Nick and Lever are finally here!
description.es-la: Esta es la historia de dos extranjeros que viven en Japón: Nick, con su elegante melena, y Lever, con sus deslumbrantes ojos que se ocultan detrás de sus gafas de sol. Este alocado dúo se enfrentará a cualquier obstáculo que se les presente mientras tratan de sobrevivir día a día en la tierra del sol naciente.

A Useless Idol and the Only Fan in the World

description.en:
"Urumin" is an idol, but she can't sing or dance well, and she's got a dishonest character. Kimiya is the only fan in the world who likes her. The relationship between the two of them is a little different from the usual relationships between idols and fans! 

This is a "precious" love comedy that depicts the daily life of a bad idol and the man who keeps on promoting her, and the way he loves her!
description.ja: "うるみん"はアイドルなのに歌も踊りもダメダメで性格も素直じゃない。そんな彼女を推している世界で一人だけのファン、キミヤ。ふたりの関係性は普通のアイドル、ファンとの関係性と違ってちょっと変！？ダメなアイドルと彼女を推し続ける男の日常を描く、愛し方がすごい「尊い」系ラブコメディ！
description.pt-br: “Urumin” é uma idol, mas ela não consegue cantar nem dançar bem e não costuma ser sincera com seus reais sentimentos. “Kimiya” é seu único fã. A relação entre eles é um pouco diferente das relações normais entre fãs e ídolos! Esta é uma comédia romântica que retrata a vida diária de uma idol completamente desajeitada e o homem que continua a apoiá-la, demonstrando seu fanatismo até nos piores momentos!
